name: FIND THE PORTAL
description:
FIND THE PORTAL

It is a third person platformer game.

The ultimate aim to find the real portal the others are fake one.

If you enter on the fake portal you will be again fall in the same level.

Entering correct portal moves to next level.

Avoid the enemy by jumping on it, If the enemy hit on you the game will restart.

How is the game experience, smoothness, lighting,
